dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 6743 IH: Level Up Nutrition for CHildren in Every School Act of 2022
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. McGovern introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Labor

form.official-title: To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to increase the reimbursement rate of school meals.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Level Up Nutrition for CHildren in Every School Act of 2022 or the LUNCHES Act of 2022.

section.header: Increasing the Reimbursement Rate of School Meals
section.text: Section 4(b)(2) of the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act (42 U.S.C. 1753(b)(2)) is amended by striking 10.5 cents and inserting 59.5 cents.
